title: WTB : t206 Cy Young Glove Showing
author: tonyo

posts.post_title: WTB : t206 Cy Young Glove Showing
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

I'd like to add a low grade (Fair/Good/VG) verison of T206 Cy Young Glove Showing before the end of 2010.

Any back is ok,  my only criteria are:  Want to see some of the white border around the entire perimeter of the frame,  would like decent centering,  minor paper loss on front is ok if it doesn't detract from the picture of Cy,  creases are ok,  paper loss on back is ok just so I can read the brand, subjects, factory.

If anyone has one they would like to sell,  please send scans and asking price to [url]tonyooten@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks and have a happy New Year!

Tony

Here are a couple that I have available for purchase on my website...

[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/CyYoungT2061909Cycle460GloveShowsSGC40.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/CyYoungT2061909PolarBearSGC40VG.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks Christopher for responding.  I have purchased a Young from another board member.

Tony
